verses.verse: In the <S%H8141>year<s%> that <S%H8661>Tartan<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> (when <S%H5623>Sargon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him,) and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> it;

At the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H6605>loose<s%> the <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> your <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H2502>put<s%> off your <S%H5275>shoe<s%> from your <S%H7272>foot.<s%> And he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> and <S%H3182>barefoot.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Like as my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> has <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> and <S%H3182>barefoot<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for a <S%H226>sign<s%> and <S%H4159>wonder<s%> on <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and on <S%H3568>Ethiopia;<s%>

<S%H3651>So<s%> shall the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H5090>lead<s%> away the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7628>prisoners,<s%> and the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> <S%H1546>captives,<s%> <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H2205>old,<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> and <S%H3182>barefoot,<s%> even with their <S%H8357>buttocks<s%> <S%H2834>uncovered,<s%> to the <S%H6172>shame<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
And they shall be <S%H2865>afraid<s%> and <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> their <S%H4007>expectation,<s%> and of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> their <S%H8597>glory.<s%>

And the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H339>isle<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H3541>such<s%> is our <S%H4007>expectation,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> we <S%H5127>flee<s%> for <S%H5833>help<s%> to be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> from the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria:<s%> and <S%H349>how<s%> shall we <S%H4422>escape?<s%>
